channel.title: Managed Services on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Managed Services on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: security: Introducing the Microsoft Defender Experts Suite: Elevate your security with expert-led services
item.description:
Microsoft announced the Microsoft Defender Experts Suite, an integrated collection of expert-led services designed to help security teams respond to and keep pace with modern cyberattacks, as described on the Microsoft Security Blog.

  • Source: Microsoft Security Blog

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: AKS Automatic managed system node pools
item.description:
Microsoft announced a public preview for AKS Automatic managed system node pools, a feature that automates provisioning and maintenance (scaling, patching, availability) of AKS system node pools to reduce operational overhead and let teams focus on applications.

  • Source: Azure Updates
